pageProduct.name: A'kin Replenishing Antioxidant Night Cream 50ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Infused with Coconut Water for instant hydration and Green Tea to help protect skin from free radicals.

- Overnight hydration
- Boost and replenish skin's moisture

81% agreed skin experience long-lasting hydration^
86% of users agreed skin felt replenished after sleep^
90% of users agreed skin felt instantly hydrated^

A highly penetrating night cream enriched with Organic Coconut Water and Vitamin E to nourish and replenish skin while you sleep and Green Tea to help protect skin against pollution and free radical damage.

^Results based on an independent laboratory self-assessment study.

Size: 50mL

Warnings

We recommend patch testing before use. For external use only.

Ingredients

"Water (Aqua), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*+, Cetearyl Olivate*, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*+, Cetearyl Alcohol*, Glycerin*, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil Phytosterol Esters*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Sorbitan Olivate*, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil*, Sucrose Stearate*, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Niacinamide, Tocopheryl Acetate* (Vit.E), Palmitoyl Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice*, Behenyl Alcohol*, Sorbitan Caprylate*, Hydrogenated Olive Oil*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Phytosterols*, Xanthan Gum*, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Gluconate*#, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil Unsaponifiables*, Palmitic acid*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Tocopherol, Fragrance*, Lecithin*, Potassium sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Propanediol, Benzoic Acid, Limonene^, Linalool^, Citronellol^, Citral^

+ Certified Organic, *from Botanical source, #non GMO, ^natural component of essential oil"

Directions

After cleansing, gently massage into face, neck and decolletage.
